ValidationRule.description: Il campo Elenco valori Risposta risulta vuoto per un Tipo Risposta "Dominio chiuso"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(ResponseValueList1__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse1__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList2__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse2__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList3__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse3__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList4__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse4__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList5__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse5__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList6__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse6__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList7__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse7__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList8__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse8__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList9__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse9__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList10__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse10__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList11__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse11__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList12__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse12__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList13__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse13__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList14__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse14__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList15__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse15__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList16__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse16__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList17__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse17__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList18__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse18__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList19__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse19__c, "Dominio chiuso")), AND(ResponseValueList20__c = "", ISPICKVAL(TypeResponse20__c, "Dominio chiuso")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: L'elenco valori Ã¨ obbligatorio per risposte di Tipo "Dominio Chiuso"
